projects.name: Hidden Aactivity Signal and Trajectory Anomaly Characterization (HAYSTAC) by IARPA

projects.name: Biometric Recognition and Identification at Altitude and Range (BRIAR) by IARPA
projects.description: Worked on cross-domain few-shot learning for training on ground camera videos and testing on drone videos. Also worked on feature fusion for multiple retrieval methods.
